		O
Law	O
Laid	O
Down	O
:	O
	      	O
The	O
Motor	O
Vehicles	O
Act	O
,	O
1988	O
being	O
the	O
Central	O
Legislation	O
does	O
		O
not	O
contemplate	O
grant	O
of	O
fitness	O
certificate	O
and	O
it	O
is	O
left	O
to	O
be	O
framed	O
by	O
		O
the	O
State	O
Government	O
,	O
therefore	O
,	O
the	O
issue	O
of	O
fitness	O
certificate	O
and	O
		O
payment	O
of	O
tax	O
falls	O
within	O
the	O
legislative	O
competence	O
of	O
the	O
State	O
in	O
		O
terms	O
of	O
Section	O
65(2)(d	O
)	O
of	O
the	O
Act	O
of	O
1988	O
and	O
under	O
Section	O
3	O
of	O
the	O
		O
M.P.	O
Motoryan	O
Karadhan	O
Adhiniyam	O
,	O
1991	O
.	O
Thus	O
,	O
Sub	O
-	O
Rule	O
(	O
2	O
)	O
of	O
		O
Rule	O
48	O
of	O
the	O
M.P.	O
Motor	O
Vehicles	O
Rules	O
,	O
1994	O
contemplating	O
		O
requirement	O
of	O
no	O
dues	O
certificate	O
for	O
grant	O
of	O
fitness	O
certificate	O
,	O
can	O
not	O
		O
be	O
said	O
to	O
be	O
beyond	O
the	O
legislative	O
competence	O
of	O
the	O
State	O
		O
Government	O
.	O
	      	O
There	O
is	O
a	O
presumption	O
that	O
the	O
official	O
acts	O
are	O
performed	O
		O
regularly	O
in	O
terms	O
of	O
Sub	O
-	O
section	O
(	O
e	O
)	O
of	O
Section	O
114	O
of	O
the	O
Evidence	O
		O
Act	O
and	O
so	O
is	O
the	O
presumption	O
of	O
correctness	O
of	O
information	O
available	O
		O
on	O
the	O
website	O
.	O
Hence	O
,	O
the	O
web	O
portal	O
of	O
the	O
Department	O
should	O
have	O
		O
entire	O
data	O
of	O
tax	O
paid	O
of	O
each	O
of	O
the	O
vehicle	O
.	O
Further	O
,	O
the	O
aggrieved	O
		O
person	O
should	O
be	O
given	O
an	O
option	O
of	O
submitting	O
online	O
request	O
to	O
		O
reconcile	O
such	O
payment	O
.	O
The	O
State	O
Government	O
to	O
make	O
such	O
		O
amendment	O
in	O
the	O
software	O
.	O
		O

Paragraph	O
Nos	O
.	O
12	O
,	O

:	O

S.	B-JUDGE
Muralidhar	I-JUDGE
		       	O
1	O
.	O
Whether	O
reporters	O
of	O
local	O
paper	O
may	O
be	O
allowed	O
	          	O
to	O
see	O
the	O
judgment	O
?	O
                                      	O
Yes	O
		       	O
2	O
.	O
To	O
be	O
referred	O
to	O
the	O
reporter	O
or	O
not	O
?	O
                    	O
Yes	O
		       	O
3	O
.	O
Whether	O
the	O
judgment	O

of	O

the	O

not	O

their	O

wish	O
to	O
see	O
the	O
fair	O
copy	O
of	O
the	O
judgment	O

this	O
case	O

Muralidhar	I-JUDGE
			O
1	O
.	O
Whether	O
reporters	O
of	O
local	O
paper	O
may	O
be	O
allowed	O
	   	O
to	O
see	O
the	O
judgment	O
?	O
                                    	O
Yes	O
			O
2	O
.	O
To	O
be	O
referred	O
to	O
the	O
report	O
or	O
not	O
?	O
